metadata.title: A Formal Theory of Commonsense Psychology: How People Think People Think
metadata.authors: Andrew S. Gordon and Jerry R. Hobbs
metadata.description: Chapter 46 axioms covering repetitive execution, repetition structures, iteration through sequences, and plan execution patterns
metadata.notation: First-order logic with reified eventualities and temporal reasoning

axioms.title: Definition of repetition structure
axioms.fol: (forall (a e e1 c p) (iff (repetition a e e1 c p) (exists (g p1 e3) (and (repeatUntil' e3 e1 c)(executePlan e a p)(gen e3 e) (plan p a g)(subplan p1 p) (forall (e2) (if (executePlan' e2 a p1) (instance e2 e1)))))))
axioms.english: Agent a's execution e of plan p is a repetition of executions e1 until condition c is satisfied, with e3 having repeatUntil structure generating the execution

axioms.title: Definition of aRepetition
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e) (iff (aRepetition e2 e) (exists (a e1 c p) (and (repetition a e e1 c p)(instance e2 e1)))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is an instance of the body of repetitive execution e

axioms.title: Definition of startRepetition
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e) (iff (startRepetition e2 e) (exists (a e1 c p) (and (repetition a e e1 c p)(instance e2 e1) (forall (e3) (if (instance e3 e1) (or (equal e3 e2)(before e2 e3))))))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is the first repetition of the body of repetitive execution e, occurring before all other instances

axioms.title: Definition of terminateRepetition
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e) (iff (terminateRepetition e2 e) (exists (a e1 c p) (and (repetition a e e1 c p)(instance e2 e1) (forall (e3) (if (instance e3 e1) (or (equal e3 e2)(before e3 e2))))))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is the last repetition of the body of repetitive execution e, occurring after all other instances

axioms.title: Definition of intermediateRepetition
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e) (iff (intermediateRepetition e2 e) (exists (a e1 c p) (and (repetition a e e1 c p)(instance e2 e1) (not (startRepetition e2 e)) (not (terminateRepetition e2 e))))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is an intermediate repetition that is neither the first nor last instance of the body

axioms.title: Definition of completedRepetitions
axioms.fol: (forall (s e t) (iff (completedRepetitions s e t) (and (repetition a e e1 c p) (forall (e2) (iff (member e2 s) (and (aRepetition e2 e) (executed a e2 p t)))))))
axioms.english: Set s contains the repetitions of execution e that have been completed by time t

axioms.title: Definition of remainingRepetitions
axioms.fol: (forall (s e t) (iff (remainingRepetitions s e t) (and (repetition a e e1 c p) (forall (e2) (iff (member e2 s) (and (aRepetition e2 e) (not (executed a e2 p t))))))))
axioms.english: Set s contains the repetitions of execution e that remain to be executed at time t

axioms.title: Definition of currentRepetition
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e t) (iff (currentRepetition e2 e t) (exists (a e1 c p t1 t2) (and (repetition a e e1 c p)(aRepetition e2 e) (begins t1 e2)(before t1 t) (ends t2 e2)(before t t2)))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is the current repetition in repetitive execution e at time t, with t between its start and end times

axioms.title: Definition of previousRepetition
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e t) (iff (previousRepetition e2 e t) (exists (a e1 c p t2 e0 t0) (and (repetition a e e1 c p)(aRepetition e2 e) (ends t2 e2)(before t2 t) (startRepetition e0 e)(ends t0 e0)(before t0 t) (not (exists (e3 t3) (and (aRepetition e3 e)(nequal e3 e2) (ends t3 e3)(before t2 t3) (before t3 t))))))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is the most recent repetition that ended before time t, with no other repetitions ending between e2 and t

axioms.title: Definition of nextRepetition
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e t) (iff (nextRepetition e2 e t) (exists (a e1 c p t2 e0 t0) (and (repetition a e e1 c p)(aRepetition e2 e) (begins t2 e2)(before t t2) (terminateRepetition e0 e)(begins t0 e0) (before t t0) (not (exists (e3 t3) (and (aRepetition e3 e)(nequal e3 e2) (begins t3 e3)(before t3 t2) (before t t3))))))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is the next repetition that begins after time t, with no other repetitions beginning between t and e2

axioms.title: Definition of repetitionsCount
axioms.fol: (forall (n e t) (iff (repetitionsCount n e t) (exists (a e1 c p s) (and (repetition a e e1 c p) (completedRepetitions s e t)(card n s)))))
axioms.english: Integer n is the number of repetitions of execution e that have been completed by time t

axioms.title: Definition of iterationThru
axioms.fol: (forall (e e1 x s s1) (iff (iterationThru e e1 x s s1) (and (arg* x e1)(sequence s)(sequence s1) (forall (y) (if (inSeq y s)(instance y x))) (forall (e2 n) (iff (nth e2 n s1) (exists (y) (and (nth y n s) (subst x e1 y e2))))))))
axioms.english: Execution e is an iteration through sequence s where entity x in body e1 is substituted by successive elements of s to create sequence s1 of instantiated executions

axioms.title: Definition of startIterationThru
axioms.fol: (forall (e2 e) (iff (startIterationThru e2 e) (exists (e1 x s s1) (and (iterationThru e e1 x s s1)(first e2 s1)))))
axioms.english: Execution e2 is the first iteration in the iterationThru e, being the first element in the sequence of iterations

axioms.title: Definition of completedIterationsThru
axioms.fol: (forall (s0 e t) (iff (completedIterationsThru s0 e t) (exists (e1 x s s1) (and (iterationThru e e1 x s s1) (forall (e2) (iff (member e2 s0) (exists (t2) (and (member e2 s1)(ends t2 e2) (before t2 t)))))))))
axioms.english: Set s0 contains the iterations through e that have been completed by time t

axioms.title: Definition of doNextIterationThru'
axioms.fol: (forall (e3 a e t) (iff (doNextIterationThru' e3 a e t) (exists (e1 x s s1 p) (and (iterationThru e e1 x s s1) (execute a e3 p) (nextRepetition e3 e t)))))
axioms.english: Action e3 is agent a's execution of the next iteration in the iterationThru e at time t

axioms.title: Definition of abortIterationThru
axioms.fol: (forall (a e t) (iff (abortIterationThru a e t) (exists (e1 x s s1 p) (and (iterationThru e e1 x s s1) (executePlan' e a p) (abort a p t)))))
axioms.english: Agent a aborts iterationThru e at time t before completing the entire sequence of entities

axioms.title: Definition of completeIterationThru
axioms.fol: (forall (a e t) (iff (completeIterationThru a e t) (exists (e1 x s s1 p) (and (iterationThru e e1 x s s1) (executePlan' e a p) (executedPlan a p t)))))
axioms.english: Agent a completes iterationThru e at time t when all entities in the sequence have been processed

conversion_notes.reified_predicates: Uses primed predicates for actions like repeatUntil', executePlan', doNextIterationThru' indicating reified eventuality structures
conversion_notes.temporal_reasoning: Extensive use of temporal predicates (before, begins, ends) for ordering repetitions and iterations in time
conversion_notes.plan_execution: Integration with plan execution framework from earlier chapters, showing repetitive structures as organized plan patterns
conversion_notes.sequence_operations: Sophisticated sequence manipulation for iteration through collections with substitution operations
conversion_notes.set_characterization: Multiple predicates defined through set membership criteria based on temporal completion status
conversion_notes.dual_frameworks: Provides both repetition (repeat-until loops) and iteration (for-each loops) frameworks for different repetitive patterns

file_format_notes.axiom_extraction: All 17 axioms extracted from pages 478-482 with complete FOL expressions and natural language explanations
file_format_notes.predicate_inventory: 17 new predicates introduced specifically for repetitive execution concepts
file_format_notes.complexity_analysis: Balanced complexity distribution with sophisticated temporal ordering axioms as most complex
file_format_notes.pattern_categorization: 8 distinct axiom patterns identified, with basic definitions predominating
file_format_notes.cross_references: Heavy dependence on Chapter 17 event structures and general plan execution framework
